column4: Hmm... Actually, does anyone know how I can backup my programs/files/config files to another partition prior to wiping and reinstalling ubuntu?
Please, anyone? Just tell me what/how to backup and I'll leave you in peace. I'm positive it will solve all my problems. Err. For the time being.
: you could just copy your /home/ dir to a cdrom
Ok, so what about programs I've installed? Netbeans and opera are the ones that matter really.
